 GUIDE TO FIRST YEAR 
 Welcome to Concordia 
 Once you have your offer of admission in hand, follow these steps to become a Concordian. 
 Graduate students, please refer to the  handbook  especially for you. 
 International students, have a look at  pre-departure guide  too. 
 We wish you all the best in the year ahead! 
 Step  1 Confirm your offer 
 Step 2 Send transcripts 
 Step 3 Register for courses 
 Step 4 Organize funding
